faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How accurate is the real-time tracking?
faq.answer1: Our tracking system updates every few minutes, providing near real-time information about snow plow locations and operations across Montreal.
faq.question2: Do I need to create an account to use the service?
faq.answer2: No account is required to view the live map and track plows. However, creating a free account allows you to save favorite streets and receive personalized alerts.
faq.question3: How do I receive parking alerts?
faq.answer3: Once you create an account and add your favorite streets, you'll automatically receive notifications before plows are scheduled to arrive, giving you time to move your car.
faq.question4: Does the service cover all of Montreal?
faq.answer4: Yes! We track snow removal operations across all 19 boroughs of Montreal, covering over 10,000 streets throughout the city.
faq.question5: What should I do if a plow doesn't appear on the map?
faq.answer5: If a plow is missing from the map, it may be on a break or the data hasn't updated yet. Check back in a few minutes, or contact us if the issue persists.
faq.answer6: Yes, the basic service is completely free. You can view the live map, track plows, and receive alerts at no cost.
